subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Recently unsealed search-warrant affidavits identify seven more baseball players who may have used performance-enhancing drugs, including former pitcher Sid Fernandez who has been out of baseball for ten years.
snippet: Recently unsealed search-warrant affidavits identify seven more baseball players who may have used performance-enhancing drugs, including former pitcher Sid Fernandez who has been out of baseball for ten years.
